entries.title: Chanel Creative Director to Leave in Latest Fashion Shake-Up
entries.description: Virginie Viard is set to leave the luxury brand, marking the departure of one of the few women to lead the artistic direction of a major fashion house.

entries.title: 'The Watchers' Review: All Eyes on a New Shyamalan
entries.description: Produced by M. Night Shyamalan, his daughter Ishana’s debut feature struggles to steer its intriguingly supernatural premise to a satisfying end.

entries.title: AI Siphons Copper Supplies Needed for Green Transition
entries.description: Electrification continues to drive demand for the eternal metal, but the focus is shifting from EVs to the data centers needed to power artificial intelligence.

entries.title: Demand for Workers Rises at Small Firms…
entries.description: .… but the latest NFIB survey finds flat employment as positions go unfilled.

entries.title: Hamas Leader Sinwar Holds Firm on Demands for Gaza Cease-Fire With Israel
entries.description: The group’s chief in Gaza issued his first response to a plan promoted by President Biden, as Palestinian officials accused Israel of killing dozens in an airstrike.

entries.title: How Much Is Mar-a-Lago Actually Worth? It's a Billion-Dollar Question.
entries.description: The answer isn’t straightforward, thanks to a preservation easement placed on former President Trump’s Palm Beach estate.

entries.title: What 13 Stylish Men Really Want for Father's Day
entries.description: These dads just want a nice watch, a cooking class and a new pair of shoes.

entries.title: Clean-Energy Investment This Year To Be Twice That of Fossil Fuels, IEA Says
entries.description: Spending on renewables, grids and storage is now higher than total investment in oil, gas and coal.

entries.title: ECB Cuts Interest Rates for First Time Since 2019
entries.description: The quarter-point rate cut potentially puts the ECB and the Fed on different tracks and widens an existing gap in borrowing costs between the U.S. and Europe.

entries.title: 'The Cleopatras' Review: The Last Queens of Egypt
entries.description: The Cleopatra we know from Shakespeare was the last Egyptian queen to bear that name. Her predecessors were not to be trifled with.

entries.title: Justices Allow Insurers To Challenge Mass-Tort Bankruptcy Plans
entries.description: The Supreme Court ruled insurance carriers have legal standing to challenge bankruptcy plans involving large numbers of lawsuits, a win for insurers’ efforts to limit policy payouts on mass personal-injury claims.

entries.title: FDA Rescinds Juul Ban, Opening Door for Federal Clearance
entries.description: The e-cigarette maker’s products remain on the market. The FDA didn’t give a timeline for a final decision on whether they can stay there.

entries.title: Gold Futures Rise on Slipping Treasury Yields, Chinese Demand
entries.description: Gold futures climbed, as exchange traded funds continued to buy in on lower U.S. Treasury yields.

entries.title: U.S. Natural Gas Futures Hold Gains After Storage Build
entries.description: U.S. natural gas futures hit the brakes as inventories for last week came in above expectations, but remained higher on the day.

entries.title: Why Are the Top U.S. Women Sprinters Black and the Top Marathoners White?
entries.description: A longstanding racial division in U.S. sports can be traced to the culture of athletics at women’s colleges in the early 20th century.

entries.title: SpaceX Marks Milestone With Starship Re-Entry and Splashdown
entries.description: The Elon Musk-led company is developing the rocket for future missions, including NASA’s first astronaut trip to the moon in decades.

entries.title: NVent Electric to Buy Trachte From Palladium for $695 Million
entries.description: The buyer said it plans to fund the acquisition, which is slated to close in the third quarter, with a combination of cash on hand and new debt.

entries.title: Robinhood Doubles Down on Crypto With Deal for Bitstamp
entries.description: The move comes a month after an SEC notice of a potential lawsuit over Robinhood’s crypto offerings.

entries.title: A Natural-Gas Billionaire Bets on Greener Fossil Fuel
entries.description: NET Power CEO Danny Rice says a new decarbonizing process could open the way for utilities to produce clean energy from natural gas.

entries.title: How to Reduce Your Risk When Using Personal-Finance Apps
entries.description: The more apps you use, the more risk there is that your information will be compromised. But there are precautions you can take to protect yourself.
